author: cmpilato
msg: Some additional command-line maturity for 'svnrdump':  Now, explicitly
declare and display the available options for each subcommand, and
validate what is provided by the user against the same.
(svnrdump_cmd_table): Fix usage lines > 80 characters.  Explicitly name
the set of accepted options.  (Tweaked the indentation of this for a bit
(main): Keep track of which options were passed to the subcommand, and
validate them all against the command table records.

author: rmuir
msg: print seed/debug info on uncaught exceptions
